text: Stanisław Wołodko (20 March 1950 - 4 February 2021) was a Polish athlete. He competed in the men's discus throw at the 1976 Summer Olympics. He was born in Vilnius, Lithuania. Wołodko died on 4 February 2021 in Warsaw, aged 70.Nie żyje Stanisław Wołodko ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish athletes Category:Discus throwers Category:Olympians for Poland Category:People from Vilnius
title: Stanisław Wołodko
